Pre-Game Insights: South Africa is missing several key players due to the Indian Premier League and injuries, including Quinton de Kock and Temba Bavuma. Heinrich Klaasen will lead the team in his absence.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first of a four-match T20I series between South Africa and Pakistan, with the last T20I meeting prior being earlier in 2021.
Others: The match will be telecast on Star Sports 2 and Star Sports 2HD in India and on Super Sport in South Africa, with live streaming available on Disney+Hotstar.
